CHAT.comment: Playing in front of the video camera and looking at books.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: no corresponding video for the first 40 seconds of this session (linkage starts on line 80) .
Nina stands up and goes towards the camera .
Lucille also goes in front of the camera sitting on her chair .
pointing at Chloé in the control screen next to the camera .
slightly leaning to the right so that she appears in the control screen and pointing towards her chin several times .
both girls are now waving at the camera .
first and very quickly pointing at Nina and then pointing at the picture in the control screen .
Chloé stands up , takes her chair and comes towards the camera .
moves her chair in front of the camera .
turning the camera so that Chloé is also filmed .
turning the camera back on the two girls .
the three girls take their chairs and go back around the table .
showing the chair next to Nina .
pointing at the chair next to Nina .
Nina has reached the last page of her book .
Lucille's book is up side down .
the teddy bear in her book is wearing a raining hat .
turning the pages of Lucille's book .
Nina pulls the scratch part of the shoes in the book .
pointing at the next page in Nina's book .
showing Nina how to pull the teddy bear's socks up .
